name: OG: Turret Shot
description:
I made this game when I was 11. It... is an experience.

Use the arrow keys to shoot in different directions and try for a high score!

TitleTurret ShotEstimated Release Date2006My Age at the Time11EngineGameMaker 6.0

I dare you to post some of your old games, add the "og" tag, and link to them in the comments below.
